entry.tran: 令人心碎的;使人悲痛的
entry.def: Something that is heartbreaking makes you feel extremely sad and upset.

example.ex: This year we won't even be able to buy presents for our grandchildren. It's heartbreaking.
example.tran: 今年我们甚至无法给自己的孙儿辈买礼物了。这真让人心碎。

means.word_mean: 1. causing or marked by grief or anguish;
